Title: Motherboy XXX
Plot: Lucille abducts George Michael for a mother-son dance, Buster adjusts to having a hook for a hand and Gob reunites with his estranged wife. Also, Tobias stars as George Sr. in a biopic about the Bluth family, which causes Lindsay to become more attracted to him.
GuestStars: Timothy Brennen, Sammy Fine, Carl Weathers, Dave Attell, Henry Winkler, Karly Rothenberg, Gil Glasgow, Ryan Raddatz
